code:
State machine: simple_fsm
States: A, B, C, D
Transitions:
  - walk: A → B
  - run: B → C
  - sprint: C → D
Initial state: A
dot:
digraph simple_fsm {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=simple_fsm rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	A [label="A\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2]
	B [label="B\l"]
	C [label="C\l"]
	D [label="D\l"]
	A -> B [label=walk]
	B -> C [label=run]
	C -> D [label=sprint]
}

code:
State machine: conditional_fsm
States: A, B, C
Transitions:
  - go: A → B [condition: ['is_ready']]
  - go: A → C
  - back: B → A
  - back: C → A
Initial state: A
dot:
digraph conditional_fsm {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=conditional_fsm rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	A [label="A\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2]
	B [label="B\l"]
	C [label="C\l"]
	A -> B [label=go]
	A -> C [label=go]
	B -> A [label=back]
	C -> A [label=back]
}

code:
State machine: traffic_light
States: green, yellow, red
Transitions:
  - slow_down: green → yellow
  - stop: yellow → red
  - go: red → green
Initial state: green
dot:
digraph traffic_light {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=traffic_light rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	green [label="green\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2]
	yellow [label="yellow\l"]
	red [label="red\l"]
	green -> yellow [label=slow_down]
	yellow -> red [label=stop]
	red -> green [label=go]
}

code:
State machine: door_controller
States: closed, opening, open, closing
Transitions:
  - open_button: closed → opening
  - opened: opening → open
  - close_button: open → closing
  - closed_complete: closing → closed
Initial state: closed
dot:
digraph door_controller {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=door_controller rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	closed [label="closed\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2]
	opening [label="opening\l"]
	open [label="open\l"]
	closing [label="closing\l"]
	closed -> opening [label=open_button]
	opening -> open [label=opened]
	open -> closing [label=close_button]
	closing -> closed [label=closed_complete]
}

code:
Hierarchical developer workflow
States: sleeping, eating, working (with nested: coding, testing, reviewing)
Transitions include nested state handling
dot:
digraph developer_workflow {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=developer_workflow rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	subgraph cluster_working {
		graph [color=black fillcolor=white label="working\l" rank=source style=solid]
		subgraph cluster_working_root {
			graph [color=None label="" rank=min]
			working [fillcolor=black shape=point width=0.1]
		}
		working_coding [label="coding\l" color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
		working_testing [label="testing\l" color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
		working_reviewing [label="reviewing\l" color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	}
	sleeping [label="sleeping\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	eating [label="eating\l" color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	sleeping -> working_coding [label=work]
	sleeping -> eating [label=eat]
	working_coding -> working_testing [label=test]
	working_testing -> working_reviewing [label=review]
	working -> sleeping [headlabel=sleep ltail=cluster_working]
	working -> eating [headlabel=eat ltail=cluster_working]
	eating -> eating [label=eat]
}
description: transitions: hierarchical FSM with nested states

code:
Linear workflow with wildcard transitions
States: A, B, C, D, E
forward: sequential progression
back/reset: from any state to A
dot:
digraph linear_workflow {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=linear_workflow rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	A [label="A\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2]
	B [label="B\l"]
	C [label="C\l"]
	D [label="D\l"]
	E [label="E\l"]
	A -> B [label=forward]
	A -> A [label="back | reset"]
	B -> C [label=forward]
	B -> A [label="back | reset"]
	C -> D [label=forward]
	C -> A [label="back | reset"]
	D -> E [label=forward]
	D -> A [label="back | reset"]
	E -> A [label="back | reset"]
}

code:
Simple toggle FSM
States: idle, active
start: idle -> active
stop: active -> idle
dot:
digraph simple_toggle {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=simple_toggle rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	idle [label="idle\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2]
	active [label="active\l"]
	idle -> active [label=start]
	active -> idle [label=stop]
}
